flawed_nl_solution:
He increased his speed by 150*0.3=45 mph
So his new speed was 150+45=<<150+45=200>>200 mph
He increased it a further 10 mph so his new speed is 200+10=<<200+10=210>>210 mph
#### 210

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 195, not 200. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
